services.subheadline: Independent experts helping you avoid bad purchases. Professional automotive expert services across Europe.

carSearch.title: Car Search & Delivery
carSearch.description: Full service - vehicle sourcing, technical inspection, delivery to your door and documentation assistance.
features: Vehicle sourcing according to your requirements and budget across Europe
Full technical inspection with professional equipment
Engine diagnostics and VIN history check in multiple databases
Body, paint, and interior element inspection
Detailed report with photos and expert opinion
Delivery to your door at your specified address
Documentation assistance and verification
Negotiation process with seller and price discussions
Service history stored in dealer and manufacturer databases
Accident and repair history verification
Completeness verification against VIN number
Everything while you can stay home - full service from A to Z
carSearch.disclaimer: * Service available in all European countries. More detailed information upon request.

prePurchase.title: Pre-Purchase Car Inspection
prePurchase.description: Detailed vehicle technical inspection before purchase across all of Europe. Engine diagnostics, VIN history check, body and paint inspection.
features: Engine diagnostics with professional equipment
VIN history check in multiple databases
Body and paint inspection
Electronic unit scanning and error code reading
Paint thickness measurement and repair trace identification
Interior elements and safety belt inspection
Technical fluid quality and level assessment
Tire tread and wear inspection
Suspension and brake system assessment
Battery and electrical system inspection
Test drive and functionality verification
Detailed report with photos and expert opinion

mobile.title: Mobile Roadside Service
mobile.description: Roadside assistance - error diagnostics, battery testing, engine start, ECU programming and key repairs.
features: Flat tire / No spare wheel / Tire puncture assistance
Need a jump start (battery charge)
Empty fuel tank
Door unlocking / Key making and duplicate key production
Handbrake release
Error diagnostics and clearing / Electrical fault reading
Battery testing, check with printed report and replacement
ECU and electronic unit programming / coding
Bulb replacement and programming
Switch replacement / Window mechanism replacement and repair
Brake, engine and interior repairs on location
General repairs as needed

items.title: You Find the Desired Car
items.description: You choose a vehicle that interests you and simply contact us. No need to travel anywhere.

items.title: We Inspect and Document
items.description: Our expert comes to the vehicle location and performs a detailed technical inspection with professional equipment. You can stay home.

items.title: You Receive Full Information
items.description: You receive a detailed report with photos and expert opinion on the vehicle condition. Now you can make an informed decision.

categories.title: Engine
categories.description: Visual inspection and computer diagnostics of the engine to identify oil leaks, noises, sensor and injector operation deficiencies.
items: Computer diagnostics with professional equipment for comprehensive engine parameter assessment
Scanning of all electronic units to identify error codes and system status
Injector operation and efficiency check in the fuel injection system
Sensor operation and response check in all engine systems
Hybrid electric motor and battery inspection for electrical component status assessment

categories.title: VIN Number
categories.description: VIN number check in multiple international and local databases to identify vehicle history.
items: CarVertical/AutoDNA international database check for accidents, mileage and owner history
Service history and warranty information stored in dealer and manufacturer databases
LTAB insurance claims and accident history check
CSDD official registration and technical inspection history
Auction records to identify possible accident or repair history

categories.title: Body and Interior
categories.description: Comprehensive inspection of body and interior elements to assess vehicle condition and identify possible damage or repairs.
items: Paint thickness measurement, body and interior element inspection to reveal repair or accident traces and assess vehicle condition
Interior elements, equipment and safety belt condition and functionality check
Glass and exterior optics compliance check against regulatory standards
Completeness compliance check against VIN number to identify possible modifications

categories.title: Technical Fluids
categories.description: Technical fluid quality and level check to assess vehicle maintenance status and safety.
items: Brake fluid quality and level check for brake system safety
Engine oil quality and level assessment for engine protection
Coolant quality and level check for optimal cooling
Transmission fluid quality and level check for gearbox operation
Power steering fluid level check for steering system functionality

categories.title: Suspension
categories.description: Suspension, brake system and tire condition assessment with test drive and visual inspection.
items: Tire tread remaining measurement and wear uniformity assessment
Brake disc and pad condition check to assess wear and efficiency
Steering and suspension system condition assessment with test drive
Suspension component and connection check for safety and comfort

categories.title: Electrical System
categories.description: Electrical system, battery and charging mechanism check to ensure safe and reliable operation.
items: Battery condition and charge level assessment
Charging system and alternator operation efficiency check
Starter system and electrical installation condition check

antiFraud.headline: FRAUD TACTICS:
antiFraud.subheadline: These are the most common fraud tactics you may encounter when buying a used car. Our experts help you detect them before purchase.
antiFraud.ctaText: Order our inspection and avoid these fraudsters

tactics.title: Mileage Tampering
tactics.description: By altering odometer readings, sellers dishonestly increase vehicle value but reduce component lifespan.

tactics.title: Hidden Accident Damage
tactics.description: Most repairs are done poorly, making such vehicles unsafe and potentially causing major problems.

tactics.title: Damaged Safety Systems
tactics.description: Safety system repairs are very expensive. Rarely after accidents are these systems restored, instead they are programmed and 'skillfully' hidden, making the vehicle unsafe.

tactics.title: Hidden Engine Defects
tactics.description: Most hidden defects can only be detected with appropriate diagnostic equipment.

tactics.title: True Year and Equipment
tactics.description: By indicating false vehicle production year and equipment, a great way to attract unsuspecting buyers.

tactics.title: Service Book and Documents
tactics.description: Fictitiously filled service book, mismatched sales and import documents.

darkFooterForm.headline: We would be happy to receive your message.
darkFooterForm.introText: Thank you for your interest, we will respond as soon as possible.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I strive to demonstrate my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Developed a visually unified theme, including a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while complementing it with a modern and innovative approach.
